CustomField.description: Salesforce account representing the location the product is shipped to. The account must be a descendant of the related billing document account and contain complete address details. Descendants up to five relationships deep in the hierarchy are valid.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Salesforce account representing the location the product is shipped to. The account must be a descendant of the related billing document account and contain complete address details. Descendants up to five relationships deep in the hierarchy are valid.
CustomField.label: Shipping Account
